citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 AM on 09-
MAR-2023. Inspector arrived at the facility and rang the doorbell. After no response, the inspector called phone number
on file and spoke to a facility representative who indicated that no one was available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 AM on 09-
MAR-2023. Inspector arrived at the facility and rang the doorbell. After no response, the inspector called phone number 
on file and spoke to a facility representative who indicated that no one was available for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
